---
title: "About"
---

These tutorials are part of the Epiconnector project, which aims to
develop and share open source software that enables analysis of
complex epidemiological data, with an emphasis on ease of analysis and
reproducible research.

See [here](https://epiconnector.github.io/) for more details.
